name: UITextFormattingCoordinator
desc: An object that coordinates text formatting using the standard Mac font panel.

items.name: init(for: UIWindowScene)
items.desc: Creates a text-formatting coordinator for the specified window scene.

items.name: init(windowScene: UIWindowScene)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a new text-formatting coordinator for the specified window scene.

items.name: class var isFontPanelVisible: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the font panel is visible.

items.name: class func toggleFontPanel(Any)
items.desc: Toggles the visibility of the font panel.

items.name: func setSelectedAttributes([NSAttributedString.Key : Any], isMultiple: Bool)
items.desc: Configures the initial display state of the font panel with the attributes of the selected text.

items.name: var delegate: UITextFormattingCoordinatorDelegate?
items.desc: The delegate of the text-formatting coordinator.

items.name: protocol UITextFormattingCoordinatorDelegate
items.desc: The methods that delegates of text-formatting coordinators implement to apply font panel settings to the currently selected text.
